name: ASPIC
description:
ASPIC

IT'S A CLASSIC PLATFORM WHERE YOU HAVE TO KILL ENEMIES AND COLLECT AS MUCH COINS AS POSSIBLE.

(I DID THIS GAME TO TEST ME. IT'S THE FIRST I DO AND I KNOW IT'S VERY DISCUSSIBLE, BUT I'M STILL A BEGINNER AND I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW YOURS ABOUT IT. IT'S ONLY A PROTOTYPE  MAYBE I WILL SOME UPDATES IN THE FUTURE.

IN ADDITION TO THIS, I WILL DEFINITELY PLAY OTHER GAMES BECAUSE I ENJOY ME. THAT SAID, PLAY WITH US, DON'T EXPECT ANYTHING GREAT AND ABOVE ALL, ENJOY!)
